name: Shield
casting_time: 1 reaction, which you take when you are hit by an attack or targeted by the magic missile spell

description.text: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from Magic Missile.

higher_levels.text: This spell does not scale with higher level spell slots.
